content: CBT all the way! 39 days here. I woke up craving. Thinking about how nice just one cigarette would be. Just one, and it would be so hideous that I wouldnâ€™t want another. Of course thatâ€™s bullshit. But I was able to calmly look at the craving, analyse why I was craving, and reprogram the thought I was having. No, one cigarette would not be nice. Yes, I WOULD want another, and another, and another. I calmly pushed the craving away and go up for coffee. This app is brilliant. Yâ€™all have a great day.
